cwts.networkanalysis

Class LouvainAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • cwts.networkanalysis.CPMClusteringAlgorithm
      • cwts.networkanalysis.IncrementalCPMClusteringAlgorithm
        • cwts.networkanalysis.IterativeCPMClusteringAlgorithm
          • cwts.networkanalysis.LouvainAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusteringAlgorithm, IncrementalClusteringAlgorithm, QualityClusteringAlgorithm, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class LouvainAlgorithm
extends IterativeCPMClusteringAlgorithm
    Louvain algorithm.

    The Louvain algorithm consists of two phases:

    1. local moving of nodes between clusters,
    2. aggregation of the network based on the clusters.

    These phases are repeated until no further improvements can be made. By default, local moving of nodes is performed using the StandardLocalMovingAlgorithm.

    Author:
    Ludo Waltman, Nees Jan van Eck, Vincent Traag
